item.title: Tiny-Diffusion
item.description: Minimal diffusion model for 16×16 video‑game sprites (DDPM/DDIM) in PyTorch.

item.title: Transformers Almost From Scratch
item.description: Educational PyTorch implementation of core Transformer components with a tiny LM (and a ViT variant).
